generatedPrompts.frontCover: A watercolor painting of a funny birthday card, flat 2D illustration. In the center, a cartoon character of Jordan, based on the reference photo, is dramatically tripping over a tiny pebble on a path, mid-fall with a comically surprised expression, arms flailing. Floating around him are various birthday items like a party hat, a slice of cake, and a single balloon, all seemingly flying away from him as he falls. The background is a simple, soft-focus park scene with gentle green and blue watercolor washes and visible paper texture. In the center of the card, written in a beautiful, readable, and elegant handwritten cursive script, is the text "Happy Birthday, Jordan... try not to fall into another year!" The entire image has the distinct style of a watercolor painting with soft flowing colors, artistic brush strokes, and organic paint bleeds.

Use only 20% visual density - perhaps a single small element, subtle corner detail, or soft color gradient. Most of the back should be clean, peaceful space. Think elegant minimalism. generatedPrompts.rightInterior:
Create a right interior page where this message is the absolute star: "Happy birthday, Jordan! I was going to make a joke about you getting old, but then I remembered I've known you forever and that would make me old, too. So instead, let's just eat some cake and pretend we're still 21.

Hope you have a great day!
- John". 

Use subtle style elements from the front design but keep decoration minimal (10-20% of page). Extract color hints from: "A watercolor painting of a funny birthday card, flat 2D illustration. In the center, a cartoon character of Jordan, based on the reference photo, is dramatically tripping over a tiny pebble on a path, mid-fall with a comically surprised expression, arms flailing. Floating around him are various birthday items like a party hat, a slice of cake, and a single balloon, all seemingly flying away from him as he falls. In the center of the card, written in a beautiful, readable, and elegant handwritten cursive script, is the text "Happy Birthday, Jordan... try not to fall into another year!" The entire image has the distinct style of a watercolor painting with soft flowing colors, artistic brush strokes, and organic paint bleeds.".

- EXACT TEXT REPRODUCTION: The message text must be reproduced EXACTLY as written - every word, punctuation mark, and character must be perfect
- PUT TEXT IN QUOTES: Always enclose the message text in double quotes to make it clear this is literal text to be rendered exactly
- CRYSTAL CLEAR LEGIBILITY: The handwriting must be extremely readable - prioritize clarity over artistic flourishes
- NO SPELLING ERRORS: Every word must be spelled correctly exactly as provided
- PROPER SPACING: Use appropriate letter spacing, word spacing, and line spacing for easy reading
- CONTRAST: Ensure high contrast between text and background for maximum readability
- SIZE: Make text large enough to read easily - avoid cramped or tiny text
- COMPLETE MESSAGE: Include the ENTIRE message text - do not truncate, abbreviate, or omit any part
- Use beautiful, clearly readable handwritten cursive script that feels elegant and personal
- Position the message text in the optimal location for readability (center area, avoid top/bottom 10%) 

Think premium stationery - mostly white space, perfect message placement, and just a touch of elegant decoration (corner details, small flourish, or soft wash). The message should dominate the visual hierarchy.
